TextLang.Text: Do you want to close the browser?
Connect storage media at the save destination.
There is a file with the same name at the save destination.
There is not enough free space on the Memory Stick™.
The Memory Stick™ cannot be accessed.
The Memory Stick™ cannot be read.
There is no Memory Stick™ inserted.
There is not enough free space on the SD Memory Card.
The SD Memory Card is locked.
The SD Memory Card cannot be accessed.
The SD Memory Card cannot be read.
There is no SD Memory Card inserted.
There is not enough free space on the CompactFlash®.
There is not enough free space on the USB device.
The USB device cannot be accessed.
The USB device cannot be read.
There is no USB device inserted.
There is not enough free space on the hard disk.
The hard disk cannot be accessed.
This content can only be played for %1 hours after first playback. Do you want to play it now?
The maximum number of themes that can be installed has been reached. To install this theme, you must delete an existing theme.
Downloading update data... Do not turn off the system.
Do you want to cancel the download operation?
There is not enough free space. The download operation stopped.
The maximum number of content items that can be saved has been reached. The download operation stopped.
An error occurred during the download operation.
Enter your user ID and password.

If you select [Download in Background], this screen will close and you can perform other operations while the content is downloading. To check the status of the download, go to [Network] > [Download Management].
You cannot perform background download of this content.
Background download is available only when saving on the hard disk.
The size of this content is not known. You cannot perform background download.
There is content that has not been installed. You must first install the content to be able to perform a background download.
PlayStation®Store will close and the content will play while downloading.
The maximum number of background download operations that can be performed at one time has been reached. The background download operation cannot be performed.
You have reached the maximum number of uninstalled content items. To download more content, you must first install some items.
